questions.question: This arc features the Straw Hat Pirates' separation and subsequent two-year hiatus, as well as the introduction of the Eleven Supernovas. What is...?
This arc is the first in the series and introduces Monkey D. Luffy and his aspiration to become the Pirate King. What is...?
Set on a cloud island, this arc features a battle against a powerful Warlord of the Sea known for his fiery fists. What is...?
This ability, used by a notorious pirate, grants the power to produce and control mochi. What is...?
This technique, used by Brook, involves using the cold of the underworld to freeze opponents. What is...?
This technique, a staple of Roronoa Zoro, involves rapidly slashing at an opponent in a circular motion. What is...?
This character, a former Warlord of the Sea, is known for his shadow-shadow fruit powers and large, looming presence. Who is...?
This character is the leader of the Whitebeard Pirates and was known as the 'Strongest Man in the World'. Who is...?
This former captain of the Sun Pirates and fish-man is known for his tragic past and his nickname 'Jinbe the Knight of the Sea'. Who is...?
